Package gw.api.claim

Class ClaimFilterSetBase

java.lang.Object
gw.api.filters.FilterSetBase
gw.api.claim.ClaimFilterSetBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
ABContactClaimFilterSet, OwnedRelatedClaimFilterSetBase
public class ClaimFilterSetBase extends FilterSetBase
Base claim filter set containing simple filters available in all claim filter sets
